jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
Sophia rips the bedroom curtains open while touring the house
Sophia is startled in the parking lot observing a woman and her baby
Joseph angrily throws a tub of water on Sophia to wake her up
While conjuring spirits, Sophia sees a dark shape smoking a cigarette shifting in the char across from her
A demon hand grabs Sophia and forces her into the basement
An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo
SpongeJohn appears from the darkness
As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
The bat creature comes alive and bites Tomaz
Magda is grabbed from behind
Magda is stabbed through the hole
Jackson turns his head to reveal some blood
The boy appears at the back door
The boy runs across the living room
Sarah notices the strangled man on the floor
The detective walks back into the room and shoots herself
The detective opens her eyes and there is a loud drum sound
The handyman slams into the side window of the car
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
After Scarlett puts down the phone, a man’s voice starts talking from behind the group
Mole, the presumed dead friend of one of the group members, jumps at the group when approached by Souxie. [Video]
The ghost jumps again when further approached
Benji gets attacked by a lady
A sculpture on the wall breaks off and attacks the group
A hand reaches out of the water and grabs Scarlett
Scarlett lifts the sack on a hanging person’s head when that person jumps at her. [Video]
Blood splatters on the neighbors’ wall
John runs out of the neighbors house
An unseen force pulls Mia towards the fire
The curtain suddenly blows into Mia’s face and she falls to the ground, a few seconds later a young girl runs past her
A young girl runs at Mia and becomes a full grown adult as she barges through the door
Mia looks in a baby pram and a black hand grabs her wrist
A black figure is lying at the bottom of the staircase and its face flashes on the screen
As Mia looks under the door at her baby, Annabelle’s face pops up under the other side of the door
An unseen force blows Father Perez back as he goes to enter the church
Father Perez knocks on Mia’s door with his back facing away from it. Mia opens the door and the father shouts “May god have mercy on your soul!”
A black figure jumps down from the ceiling of the house
There is a slight scare as Thomas bumps into Ffion
As the blood runs through a crack in the floorboards, we see a woman licking hungrily from underneath
As Thomas crawls through the water, a bird suddenly squawks and starts thrashing about
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
Jennifer gasps as The Grinder suddenly attacks Thomas

movies.title: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made.

jump_scares.spoiler: As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
The girl turns around and a figure in a cape stands behind her
When the girl closes the door, a figure in a cape appears behind her
After Helena comes out of the room, the camera zooms in and the cape-wearing figure appears from the room and grabs her. Very similar to the jump scare in Exorcist 3, but not at all effective
Riley is suddenly grabbed by Professor Gelson as she looks in the window
When the girl turns on the light, a man in a mask is next to her
When Riley says “Oh my” suddenly an arrow flies past her
Kris sneaks through the kitchen. On the table you can already see a man standing with a cape. When he jumps down, a loud noise is heard
Suddenly someone bangs on the car window as Kris stands in front of the house
A girl is pulled away by an evil entity. This is used a few times in the movie so it won’t be terrifying or startling

After a couple seconds of silence and buildup, the possessed and demonic Claire runs with a knife in front of the camera and her sister. This is probably the most effective jump scare since it was somewhat unexpected
The elevator making a loud noise might startle some viewers. Not that something particularly frightening is happening, just the noise is quite startling
Claire is pulled away by an evil entity
Claire is attacked by an entity
A door slams
The old lady is pulled by the evil force
An evil entity suddenly runs at the main character in the mirror
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
Something bumps into the car and it violently shakes
The camera cuts from the driver to a man standing in the road
The woman suddenly screams while driving, followed by a cut to a deformed looking man on the car window
A vulture suddenly screeches and flies into the car through a side window
There is a wide shot of some ruins while Paul is driving down a road. Suddenly, a burnt hand appears on one of the bricks accompanied by a string sound effect
Paul reaches in for the water, and Djinn’s hand suddenly reaches out of it and grabs him
After Kim says “Man, I hear voices all the time,” there is suddenly a loud cut to a man being stabbed
A few people jump out at the group from behind some bushes to scare them as a joke
A window at the back of the truck suddenly shatters as Kim is driving
As Jeff turns towards Kim, he suddenly turns into a burning electrocuted body in a vision
An owl suddenly flies through a window and it shatters
While Faith walks through the house in a dream sequence, her father suddenly drops down from the ceiling right in front of her face
Faith looks to her side and there is a cut to some masked coven members standing in the room accompanied by a sound effect
Faith leans forwards and Sissy is revealed to be standing behind her
There is a cut with a sound effect to a masked coven member watching Amy from a window
Faith says “My son is the devil,” followed by a cut to the child and a quick zoom as his face becomes distorted
A boy bangs on the car window, startling Carrie
A girl smashing into the window in front of Sue may startle some viewers
Carrie’s mother, who appears to be dead, suddenly gasps
(alternative ending)  As Sue lies on the surgical table after giving birth, a bloodied hand suddenly appears. [Video]
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
The kid’s toy begins to yell in an adult voice
A bear roars suddenly
A woman’s face flashes in front of Sarchie’s view from night vision goggles
A cat meows unexpectedly
A mousetrap snaps shut
A dead body falls out of the wall behind Sarchie
Dog begins to bark as a police team enter a bedroom
A bloodied head pops up on security camera footage
A man jumps out and grabs Sarchie from behind
Sarchie sees bloodied head man climbing over his daughters bed in the mirror
A hooded man appears in elevator
The hooded man is shown above Sarchie crawling along pipes
A man jumps out of a chest and puts Sarchie in a headlock
A clown pops out of a jack in the box
A dead body lands on Sarchie’s windscreen
Santino hisses at Sarchie
Santino’s head snaps back during the exorcism
As Elizabeth leans forward, the railing suddenly breaks and she falls forwards
A wooden plank snaps beneath Elizabeth’s feet and she screams and falls down
A dog barks during a tense scene
Zach, who appears to be asleep, suddenly jumps out of bed to scare Sam
During what appears to be some sort of ritual, there is a sudden bright light accompanied by a high pitched noise
Sam grabs Zach’s wrist
There is a sudden cut to a dog barking
The sound of a door being pushed open during a tense scene may startle some viewers
Sam suddenly appears in front of the camera screaming “get out”. [Video]
Father Thomas suddenly yells at Zach
A girl is pulled into the air by a supernatural force
Sam screams and the door slams shut. A few seconds later the door is blasted off it’s hinges
Sam screams and the furniture lifts off the ground
Sam screams once more and the pictures on the wall fly into the opposite wall
Sam tilts her neck causing Zach to go flying backwards
A body falls and hits a truck
An elevator drops down close to the building’s repairman
Someone falls onto the top of the elevator causing a loud bang
The devil appears from behind the people who are still alive
The doors burst open
Ganush charges at Christine
A handkerchief suddenly appears in front of Christine’s windscreen
Ganush attacks Christine in the car
Ganush attacks Christine again
Rham Jas suddenly has a vision of a fiery demon as he is reading Christine’s fortune. [Video]
A gust of wind startles Christine
The pots in the kitchen start to clatter into each other
An unseen force knocks Christine back
Ganush suddenly appears in bed beside Christine. [Video]
The silhouette of Lamia pops up in front of Christine
The image of Ganush suddenly appears on Christine’s phone
Lamia appears at the window in front of Christine
A black cat hisses at Christine
Christine pulls back a curtain in the shed to reveal Ganush. [Video]
The sound of a goat bleating startles Christine
There is a loud noise as the spirit enters Shaun
Chrstine goes to check on the assistant, but he turns around suddenly revealing he has been possessed
Christine sees Ganush on the road
Ganush’s handkerchief appears on Chrstine’s windscreen while she is driving
The handkerchief comes out of the fan vent and lands on Christine’s face
Christine pulls at the corpse of Ganush and it suddenly comes free
Ganush’s corpse pops up out of the water
A man appears behind Mark
As Mark speaks into his walkie-talkie, an unconscious man suddenly rears up and grabs Mark
A barking dog suddenly lunges at the car window
The sound of glass breaking during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
As the camera pans around Michelle, a ghostly face appears behind her
A door slams
A bird flies out of a dark room
Bryan sees the ghostly image of a boy standing in front of an open door
Hands shoot out from underneath a bed that Sam is standing in front of
Jules briefly glimpses a woman climbing the stairs
Michelle turns around and the face of a demonic woman suddenly appears in front of her
Jules is suddenly pulled backwards by an unseen force
John has a vision of his mother who suddenly transforms into the demonic woman
Bryan turns around to show his eyes are now black and his mouth full of a dark liquid
John turns around and is attacked by Bryan
Bryan suddenly opens his eyes and attacks an officer
A large number of birds burst out of John’s mouth
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
The boy is suddenly standing behind the refrigerator
When Gail and Luke are playing the piano, the keyboard lid slams shut out of nowhere
Ruth suddenly appears behind Gail and Josh
Josh suddenly screams

movies.title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil

jump_scares.spoiler: A snake suddenly gets hit by a stone
An apparently dead man suddenly grabs the priests hand
Some birds suddenly fly through the church
A hyena jumps out from behind a well to grab the monkey
A blanket is lifted to reveal a severed head
Sarah lies back down and Jefferies is revealed to be lying beside her. [Video]
Joseph’s bed suddenly moves
Joseph’s eyes open and the bed begins to shake violently
A bird takes flight from behind Father Merrin, a couple of seconds later several birds squawk as Father Merrin almost steps on them
Father Merrin almost loses his footing while exploring the cavern
A sound effect plays as Father Merrin turns around and sees a statue
A sound effect plays as Sarah notices Emekwi watching her
The sudden sound of doors opening may startle some viewers
The radio suddenly turns back on, loudly playing music, which causes Sarah to scream in fright. [Video]
A sound effect plays as the shroud around Joseph’s bed is ripped away to reveal a large number of villagers standing around him
Joseph is suddenly pulled through a hole
A body suddenly drops down in front of Father Merrin. [Video]
The lantern turns back on to reveal Sarah’s possessed face
A hand print appears on the window, accompanied by a loud sound effect
Eli wakes up suddenly (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
A stone suddenly hits the window, startling Eli
As Eli wipes the condensation off the window, the girl jumps out and says “BOO!”
As Eli runs down the hallway, he shines the torch back into the darkness and the ghostly girl is suddenly running right towards him
The lights turn back on and a shadowy figure stands right behind Eli
The shadowy figure bursts through the curtain but it is revealed to only be Eli’s father
Eli moves the mirror slightly to reveal a ghostly girl standing in the room behind him
A hand suddenly grabs onto the cupboard
As Eli slowly turns around, a hand reaches out from behind the shower curtain
An invisible presence pulls at Eli’s top (not particularly startling however it is accompanied by a high pitched sound effect)
During a tense scene, the sound of the automatic door closing behind Eli may be startling to some
Rose pushes the top off the stone well to reveal several corpses inside
Sammael pops up and attacks Hellboy
Tentacles burst through some metal right beside John’s head
A creature passes the camera in front of Abe
The creature suddenly attacks Abe once more
A window breaks suddenly
A giant pendulum smashes into the bridge
As they touch the woman she reanimates as a demon and the music comes in very loudly
Jessica yells now as a demon
A loud noise is heard behind him and something briefly flies by the camera
A girl appears laying behind him
The girl turns around to face him
The camera moves to a corpse and the corpse moves its eye
Camera cuts to a dead body
The lights go off and the man sees a dead person appear in front of him
The girl turns the lights off and several dead appear
A hand reaches out from the floor and grabs him
A bird flies into the window of Charlie’s classroom however we see the bird flying towards the window beforehand which substantially reduces the impact
We see a decapitated head on the road crawling with ants (not a jump scare but some viewers might find the image disturbing)
As Annie drives home from the seance she is startled by the tongue-clicking noise that her daughter makes
After the seance at home, Peter starts to freak out however this is interrupted when a glass cabinet suddenly breaks
Shortly after Annie says “Charlie, what’s wrong?” the candle on the table flares up
Peter thinks he sees Charlie in the corner of the room but it turns out to be a ball that drops and rolls across the floor. After a short pause, an arm suddenly grabs Peter around the head
Peter hears a loud noise from upstairs

During a very tense scene, Peter sees a naked man in the doorway. He then looks up to the ceiling where Annie previously was but no one is there. Suddenly, Annie rushes at him from the corner of the room

movies.title: Hotel Inferno 2: The Cathedral of Pain

jump_scares.spoiler: As Frank approaches a seemingly dead man it lunges at him
The creature in the stove suddenly puts its arm back out
A fetus flies at Frank’s face
Frank looks up to see a demon right in front of his face
The cultist quickly turns around and attacks Frank

movies.title: Hotel Inferno 3: The Castle of Screams

jump_scares.spoiler: Frank quickly removes a woman’s hood and underneath is revealed to be a burnt corpse that begins to growl
As Frank slowly reaches for the the hood, the woman suddenly stabs him
The woman suddenly attacks Frank
A demon smashes through the wall as Frank turns around
Frank peers into a dark alleyway and the camera quickly zooms onto one of the mini demons as it shrieks
Frank looks up at the ceiling and sees a large chicken claw dangling from above the boards accompanied by a sound cue
A demon jumps out from behind a pile of flesh and bones
Frank looks down on the floor and sees there is a demon right underneath him
Frank turns around and a door window shatters
The lights suddenly come on and a man jumps out from behind a box
Frank turns to his left and sees a man running at him
Young Holly turns and her mother is in the window
Holly’s hair is suddenly grabbed by a child
A robed figure rises from the tent accompanied by a clicking noise
Holly starts screaming suddenly
A bloodied Hazel jumps up after she walks down the hallway
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
The possessed woman suddenly sprouts wings and begins to screech
Sarah turns around and a kid suddenly runs at her and tackles her
There is a sudden loud roar and Sarah quickly turns around to see a dog barking at her
Sarah turns around and sees Kevin right in front of her face, startling her
Omar suddenly jumps into frame from the side to scare Sarah
A loud cat video suddenly starts to play on screen as Sarah’s glasses glitch out
Another loud cat video suddenly plays on screen
Rachel jumps at Sarah to scare her as a joke
Several loud fighter jets suddenly fly above Sarah, startling her
There is a sudden loud growl which startles everyone
Sarah peeks out from under the desk and a demon screeches and tackles her
As Sarah slowly peeks around the corner, David quickly passes in front of her on a bike
As the group is running, a corpse falls from the sky in front of them
As the camera begins to zoom out, Sarah sees a demon standing right in front of her and screaming
The demon standing still in the alleyway suddenly begins to run at the group
Sarah shines the light on a suit of armor, startling her
A sudden loud earthquake causes startles the group
As Sarah reaches to touches Rachel’s shoulder, she quickly turns around and attacks Sarah
Sarah quickly turns around and sees several screeching demons walking towards the group
Sarah turns around and Omar’s dad is standing right in front of the camera
Sarah turns on a light and there is a demon standing right in front of her, causing her to gasp
The camera begins to glitch out and quickly zooms on the demon
Sarah shines the light on the demon, who begins to screech
The young woman suddenly growls and bites down at the samurai’s neck
The homeless man suddenly yells “Shut up!” startling Jessica
A box is thrown in front of Jessica
Jessica sees a figure with a bloody pentagram on their face through the window on the door
The lights turn back on and we see two more bloodied figures with bags over their heads standing behind Jessica
There is a loud static noise as the bag-headed man moves around
The homeless man moves away from the door to reveal several figures hanging from the ceiling
The homeless man suddenly appears back at the window
A door slams
Jessica is knocked unconscious as she approaches an open door
Jessica sees a woman with a disfigured face under the table
The disfigured woman runs past the opening that Jessica is hiding in
Jessica opens her eyes and the disfigured woman is right in front of her
The homeless man passes behind Jessica
Jessica tases the homeless man and he turns to reveal a disfigured face with eyes that appear to have been removed and then stitched back into his head
The camera pans back up and one of the bag-headed cultists is standing behind Jessica
We see a close up of the bag-headed cultist’s face
Paymon screeches at Jessica from behind
The principal suddenly closes the blinds as Gary stares at Lucas
Karl startles Gary by putting his hand on Gary’s back
Gary closes the fridge door to reveal Lucas sitting on the kitchen table
When Gary looks back at the swing Lucas is gone (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Gary suddenly shines the torch into an empty room
One of the toys in Lucas’s room begins talking
Gary looks through a hole int he door and the goat puppet suddenly appears

movies.title: May The Devil Take You Too

jump_scares.spoiler: The demon who appeared behind Alfie appears again but this time with a sound effect and a scream
The ghost running up the stairs suddenly snarls
The new demon appears at the top of the ladder
The demon bursts through the door
The demon suddenly pulls back the curtain
A demon charges out of the darkness at the car
Ayub comes out from around the corner
Leo looks up and has no skin on his face
Two girl demons suddenly appear
There is a sudden glass shattering sound that startles April
April is grabbed on the head by the green demon
A cultist grabs the woman walking down the hallway from around the corner
A man tackles D’Amour while he’s looking at the tied up man in the apartment
The presumably passed out man begins to run at D’Amour while screaming
The man in the bomber jacket smacks D’Amour with a wooden board as he about to walk around the corner
D’Amour spasms in his sleep accompanied by a loud sound
D’Amour has a flashing nightmare about Quaid screaming at him
Two hands suddenly reach out of the hole
A monster appears behind Billy after he calls out for Harry
Flames burst out behind D’Amour
D’Amour’s foot slips and he falls into the open grave
A hand grabs D’Amour from the shoulder
One of the cultists runs into frame and grabs Dorothea

Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen
After entering the toilet, we see a figure in the mirror watching Dani. A few seconds later Dani runs out of the toilet and this is accompanied by some loud dissonant strings in the soundtrack

Josh is distracted by a person (who he believes to be Mark) entering the temple behind him. After he turns around and tells him “we’re not supposed to be here”, he is hit over the head by an unseen assailant
After witnessing Simon’s body being displayed ritualistically, Christian sits back up and a man blows some powder into Christian’s eyes

Doris is suddenly beside Lina’s bed

Pete jumps out as the group goes exploring through the house

On a car window the words “Hi Friend” are written in dust  all of a sudden a hand slams against the window from the inside

(Night #13) The couple wake up in their bed and a loud noise sounds from another room, followed by a bang

A shadow passes over Ali and she suddenly jolts awake
